name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea for the Maplyo AGPL core
labels: enhancement
---

## Problem statement
Describe the user problem or opportunity this feature addresses.

## Proposed solution
Outline the change you would like to see. Wireframes, pseudo-code, or API sketches are welcome.

## Alternatives considered
List any alternative solutions or workarounds you have tried.

## Additional context
- Does this feature touch the open-core boundary or require a commercial extension?
- Are there blockers (schema changes, new dependencies, etc.) we should know about?
